text:
[Verse]
Neon lights we're flying high
Dancing under starry sky
Feet on pavement heart's on fire
City's ours no desire

[Verse 2]
Taxi horns and crowded street
Meeting where our wishes meet
Concrete jungle rhythm beat
Every night we find our heat

[Chorus]
Oh oh city lights won't fade
Oh oh memories we've made
Shining bright from night to day
Let's get lost and run away

[Verse 3]
Billboards flashing dreams in sight
Every moment feels just right
Laughter echoes through midnight
Underneath the city's light

[Verse 4]
Coffee shops and hidden bars
Our reflections in old cars
We have come so very far
Living like we're shooting stars

[Chorus]
Oh oh city lights won't fade
Oh oh memories we've made
Shining bright from night to day
Let's get lost and run away
title: City Lights
